name: Gushcloud Network Widget
author: Gushcloud

sections.description:
The Gushcloud Network widget is for Gushcloud members and influencers who have signed up at www.GushMedia.com

Becoming a member of the Gushcloud Network has its privileges: 1. Sponsored writing gigs. 2. Receive branded swag & Invitation to events. 3. Apps, widgets & analytics that make you more awesome.

In addition, having the widget helps you: 1. Increase inbound traffic as others will be able to discover your blog or website on the widget and on our other apps and listings. 2. SEO: In future, having the widget will enable you to specify the link that you would like others to click into. This helps with back-links and increases the search engine rank of your website.
sections.installation:
1. After signing in with your WordPress.org account, go to the plugins tab.
  2. Click on \”Add new plugin\” and search for \”Gushcloud Network Widget.\”
  3. Select the widget and click \”Install\”
  4. After installation, you will be prompted to \”Activate plugin.\” Click \”Activate plugin\” and you should be done!

Welcome to the Gushcloud Network.
sections.faq:
How do I check my website stats?

Login with your Facebook account @ www.gushmedia.com and you\’ll see your stats. Website stats are updated daily and you may experience a 1 day delay on the numbers.
